yes, good idea. We should only have one minor and one bug-fix release checklist open at any time.

Where is the master release checklist stored? I'm assuming @jenlampton copies https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4661#issue-711585912 from somewhere each time theres a new release... I need to make an adjustment to it re. Tugboat.

Release scheduled for Sept 30th, 2020 12pm - 2pm PT Pre-release tasks Merge commits @quicksketch Create the next bugfix milestone @jenlampton Move all unfinished issues to the next bugfix release m...

Ah, found them: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/blob/master/procedures/issue-template--release--minor.md

backdrop/backdrop-issues
Issue tracker for Backdrop core. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop-issues development by creating an account on GitHub.

PR here: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4736

Update release checklist with new Tugboat steps · Issue #4736 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Here's a PR to update the release checklist with new steps for Tugboat. I'm happy to do these steps each release (if there's no objections): #4737

Has Platform.sh been updated for the latest releases of Backdrop?

Platform.sh the end-to-end cloud PaaS for hosting, development, and deployment
Get hosting, CI/CD, automated updates, global 24x7 support. We support PHP, Node.js, Drupal, WordPress, Java, Ruby, Python, MySQL, ElasticSearch, and more.
@oadaeh (Jason Flatt) it might be one release behind? I did one of the recent releases
